content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, thank you for your interest in renting the apartment. I'm happy to discuss the rental price with you. What is your budget for monthly rent?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My budget is 1000 Euros.

I am willing to negotiate with you, but I need to know the terms of the agreement first. What are the terms and conditions of the apartment rental agreement?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Sure, the terms and conditions of the apartment rental agreement would include the rental price, the length of the lease, any security deposits, move-in and move-out fees, and any other relevant details. The rental price would depend on the size and location of the apartment, as well as the amenities included. Would you like me to provide you with a breakdown of the terms and conditions?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Yes, please.

I agree to the rental price of 1200 Euros per month.

I will pay the security deposit of 200 Euros upfront, and I will pay one month's rent in advance.

I will sign a lease agreement for 12 months, with the option to renew for another 12 months if I choose to do so.

I will not sublet the apartment or allow anyone else to move in without your prior written consent.

I will keep the apartment clean and in good condition, and I will not make any alterations to the apartment without your prior written consent.

I will pay for any damages caused by me or my guests.

I will provide you with 30 days' notice if I wish to terminate the lease agreement.

I confirm that I have read and understand the terms and conditions of the apartment rental agreement.

I agree to the rental price of 1200 Euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for agreeing to the rental price of 1200 Euros per month, Emilia. Please provide me with your contact information so that we can finalize the lease agreement and arrange for the security deposit and first month's rent to be paid.
name: Heinrich Heine
